Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is designed to enhance your daily routine significantly. This product has been meticulously crafted with high-quality materials and cutting-edge technology to ensure maximum satisfaction. Given its exceptional features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity available to you, I am offering it at an exclusive price of $200. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this offer further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
